correctness.rationale: Largely incorrect and not traceable to the article, with a schema violation. Issues: (1) Schema violation: processParameters.plasmaPower is set to null, but if present must be an object. (2) Many values are fabricated/not reported: growthPerCycle, numberofCycles, filmThickness (100 nm), dosing/purge times (1000 ms), flow rates (10 sccm/50 sccm), saturation, nucleationPeriod, uniformity, conformality, refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap and “Tauc plot”, electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), film density (XRR), elemental composition (XPS), and all device properties; the article reports none of these. (3) Pressure is given as 5 mTorr; the paper mentions “a few millibars” only for ZnSe and does not specify ZnO pressure—5 mTorr is neither reported nor consistent. (4) Crystallinity is set to polycrystalline while the selected substrate (GaN/sapphire) is stated to yield crystalline (best-quality) ZnO; roughness 0.16 nm is taken from films on sapphire (not GaN/sapphire), so it’s misattributed. (5) Carrier/purging gas ‘nitrogen’ is not explicitly stated for ZnO. (6) Multiple distinct ZnO processes are described (Zn+O2 at ~480°C; ZnCl2+H2O at ~500°C; ZnCl2+O2 at ~480°C, on different substrates), but only one process is extracted. Corrections needed: remove or mark as not reported all unsubstantiated parameters; fix plasmaPower type (omit or provide valid object); correct crystallinity and roughness per substrate; do not invent pressure; and represent each distinct ZnO process separately.

completeness.rationale: The extraction captures only one ZnO ALE process (ZnCl2 + H2O at ~500 °C on GaN/sapphire) and misses other distinct ZnO processes explicitly reported: (1) metallic Zn + O2 at ~480 °C; (2) ZnCl2 + O2 with substrate ~480 °C; and multiple substrates (sapphire, GaN/sapphire, glass, SiO2/Si with 3D growth). Many reported parameters are either absent or not traceable: carrier/purging gas for ZnO, reactor pressure for ZnO, cycle times, growth-per-cycle, number of cycles, film thickness, flow rates, saturation and nucleation period are not given in the article but are filled with invented values (e.g., 1 Å GPC, 1000 cycles, 100 nm thickness, 1 s dosing/purge, 10 sccm flows, 5 mmHg pressure, nitrogen purge). Numerous material/device properties are fabricated and not supported (refractive index, absorption coefficient/Tauc plot, band gap, XPS composition and 1:1 atomic ratio, film density by XRR, electrical transport, TFT metrics, uniformity, conformality). Only the AFM roughness range (0.16–0.4 nm) and polycrystallinity on some substrates are text-supported. Schema issues: plasmaPower is set to null (type mismatch; should be omitted if not PEALD) and filmThickness is incorrectly placed inside growthPerCycle (violates additionalProperties=false), although filmThickness is also present at the correct level. To be complete and compliant, add separate process instances for each precursor pair/substrate combination with the reported source/substrate temperatures (ZnCl2 source 390 °C; substrate 500 °C or 480 °C; Zn + O2 at ~480 °C), restrict parameters to those stated (or omit if unknown), keep only supported characterization (XRD crystallinity, AFM RMS 0.16–0.4 nm, PL/CL excitonic behavior), and remove unsupported device/electrical/optical metrics.
